author: Magda Seguin
message: Last night was really devastating with the Notre Dame fire "But friends Moyane destroyed SARS..the Nugent Commission was clear "The do called 'rogue unit' never existed.The EFF is fuelling this against Gordhan Moyane fought time and again to stay relevant...he is heavily implicated in state capture "No He even sent his lawyers to testify for him at the Nugent commission Dali Mpofu came across very unprofessional at the Commission here..revisit it on YouTube. Today a SARS employee is facing disciplinary who gave the Guptas R460m VAT return ordered by Moyane..she will probably lose her job too.The payments were made via third parties What lies? "The EFF will use Judge Zondo's brother excuse if it is denied @Funicanz Exactly "I am extremely concerned about the EFF @Amanda he didn't answer my question...it does Malema is a dictator in the making @funicanz what about the militarization of the EFF? It reminds me of Idi Amin They may even invade the venue that's their style I always remind people that Malema was 12 years old when Masina was released from prison.His mentor was Peter Mokaba of 'kill the Boer fame *Madiba @funicanz you are right Mpofu is a member of the EFF executive @funicanz yes... Moyane is running from court to court and commission to commission wasting our time @Bophelo Malapela true "as a lawyer one can't keep defending hopeless cases Must I spell it out? SARS @Keatlarese @Bothell spot on @Keatlareste if you dint know SARS you must be a cyberbot Blocking a few people who trigger nonsense Thanks @funicanz The race card....when all else fails Mzilikazi Wa Afrika must have nightmares for falling for the 'rogue unit' scam...he was used to publish hogwash which brought the Sunday Times into disrepute.The Cato Manor story too. Moyane never opens his mouth...he uses his lawyers to speak for him hence Mpofu will do the bidding for him We are still waiting for the PP to produce the outcome of Estina Dairy invedtigation "Eish Moyane is pathetic "Yes but we all know the Estina report is biased "Shivambu brother Brian is trouble to the amount of R5.5m he borrowed from VBS I for one have no trust in the PP She does not represent the public...why is she also hunting down Gordhan? She wants to question Gordhan on the old 27 questions that the NPA sent to him after he was sacked by Zuma The EFF always knows beforehand what is happening inside the ANC and even makes it public before the ANC announces it Confirmed and the indisputable evidence? See my above explanation Eish I'm tired...the Notre Dame burnt last night it was terrible "Very thorough and exact Thank you Judge @Sindiswa correct.Mabuza and Ace territory @goolamv...yet the EFF are instigating communities to invade land in Gauteng I blocked him ages ago "Judge will need a long holiday Reserved @makhosi the ANC had 24 plus years to run Joburg....instead they stole the R1.7 billion "Sewerage doesn't spill into streets one day to the next...and remember Esidimeni? I lived in Joburg for 11 years until recently...potholes No...it's not a waste...only to those who do not understand policy and procedure Yes the ANC government should have resigned when Agrizzi provided tapes... They want another 25 years to rob the treasury...Ace wants to have the treasury nationalised Am I missing something? just read on Twitter state capture account that the cross exam was dismissed Thanks @Madelein Excellent @Eslon Eslon I was away for a minute "Read the analysis in the Daily Maverick...McBride opened a Pandoras box of corrupt *deceipt "Paul O'Sullivan did great work @Robert Russell they arrested both him and his assistant on false charges...they are desperate to jail and denigrate him "@Eslon Eslon long story Yes I saw it too @Robert Russell The ANC stole the future of the generation who was born in 1994...They only saw corruption in their lifetime And bribery is rife Cele made SAPS a quasi military outfit when he was police minister the first time now we have 'general's who never fought in a war "@Sibonakaliso Gumede we should never lose hope @Eslon EslonüòÑ We have recent examples of how people made a change peacefully: Sudan and Algeria @David Hotz I blocked Thando Nkutha ages ago I know @Eslon Eslon point taken "The detail of McBride' s testimony is phenomenal I wish I kept my MAD magazines from my younger days @Robert Russell @Eslon Eslon I agree I hope Shamila Batohi start the prosecutions with this section of the commission...she has huge interest in cleaning out her backyard Goodness!Israel? They have the most sophisticated spyware...the new phone spying device cost millions.The Saudi government used it on Kashoggi The Saudis spied on Kashoggi and his whereabouts and consequently killed him brutally in the Turkish Saudi embassy. SAPS should do away with military nomenclature...they are servants of the people not the army Zuma shuffled his government on a regular basis...always at night.I think it was 9 or 11 times...every time someone new came in things were changed.The newcomers were Gupta state capture choices Brilliantly explained by McBride @nyiko nyiko thanks He has already been made Head of the Parliamentary Integrity Committee by CR...if the Zuma faction get rid of CR we are again in the same boat @David Hotz Exactly What an indictment on Zuma government!! All the decisions were made at the Gupta shebeen @Thami there was no line..just party interest So many names implicated @Thami the last time I looked the ANC is the governing party and they have the majority vote.Time and again the opposition parties complained the the ANC executive has no accountability. "The ANC is the national government overall The ANC other AGAINST no confidence I Zuma NINE times...they ruined the country with their looting
